attributes.action: Ban companies from manufacturing printers that try to prevent the use of environmentaly friendly re-cycled cartridges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many printer manufacturers are preventing the use of re-cycled cartriges so that they can continue to charge consumers unfair prices on their own "original spec" catridges thus contributing to landfill and global warming.Lexmark and Epson in particular "chip" their cartridges to prevent their re-use.It is time this practice was made illegal.
